pages.md:
# Remote Movie Recording Using a Web Browser

| Item                          | Description                                                                 |
|-------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| â‘  Camera settings             | Adjust settings for the current camera.                                     |
| â‘¡ Choose for REC/STOP         | Choose the camera or cameras to which the selected action will apply.       |
| â‘¢ STOP button                 | Stop movie recording.                                                       |
| â‘£ REC button                  | Start movie recording.                                                      |
| â‘¤ Choose camera               | A list of thumbnails showing the views through the lenses of connected cameras. Click or tap a thumbnail to select a camera to control. |
| â‘¥ Check button for movies in memory card | View the movies on the memory card in the current camera.                      |
| â‘¦ Camera settings (advanced)  | Adjust (advanced) settings for the current camera.                          |
| â‘§ Screen lock button          | Enable or disable the controls in the remote recording display.             |
| â‘¨ Display mode button         | Switch displays.                                                            |
| â‘© Remote recording menu       | Adjust remote recording settings.                                           |
| â‘ª Camera lock button          | Lock or unlock the current camera, enabling or disabling its controls.      |

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> If you end the connection to a camera while it is locked, its controls will remain disabled, in which case you will need to turn the camera off.
